languages.text:
To make attacks and use {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} in combat, a character must spend {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} (or AP). Their total is displayed on the panel at the bottom of the screen.
Every attack or ability has a certain AP cost associated with it. The number of squares next to the icons of attack actions and other abilities indicates their AP cost.
At the start of each character's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, their AP are restored to their maximum value.
languages.original_text:
Для совершения атак и применения способностей в бою используются очки действий (ОД). Их общее число отображается на панели в нижней части экрана.
Каждая атака или способность требует определенных затрат ОД. Число квадратов рядом с иконками атакующих действий и других способностей означает их стоимость в бою.
В начале каждого хода ОД персонажа восстанавливаются до максимального значения.

traits.locale_text:
To make attacks and use abilities in combat, a character must spend action points (or AP). Their total is displayed on the panel at the bottom of the screen.
Every attack or ability has a certain AP cost associated with it. The number of squares next to the icons of attack actions and other abilities indicates their AP cost.
At the start of each character's turn, their AP are restored to their maximum.

To make attacks and use abilities in combat, a character must spend action points (or AP). Their total is displayed on the panel at the bottom of the screen.
Every attack or ability has a certain AP cost associated with it. The number of squares next to the icons of attack actions and other abilities indicates their AP cost.
At the start of each character's turn, their AP are restored to their maximum.

Every attack or ability has a certain AP cost associated with it. The number of squares next to the icons of attack actions and other abilities indicates their AP cost.
At the start of each character's turn, their AP are restored to their maximum value.

To make attacks and use {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} in combat, a character must spend {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} (or AP). Their total is displayed on the panel at the bottom of the screen.
Every attack or ability has a certain AP cost associated with it. The number of squares next to the icons of attack actions and other abilities indicates their AP cost.
At the start of each character's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, their AP are restored to their maximum value.

To make attacks and use {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} in combat, a character must spend {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} (or AP). Their total is displayed on the panel at the bottom of the screen.
Every attack or ability has a certain AP cost associated with it. The number of squares next to the icons of attack actions and other abilities indicates their AP cost.
At the start of each character's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, their AP are restored to their maximum value.

languages.text:
Для совершения атак и применения способностей в бою используются очки действий (ОД). Их общее число отображается на панели в нижней части экрана.
Каждая атака или способность требует определенных затрат ОД. Число квадратов рядом с иконками атакующих действий и других способностей означает их стоимость в бою.
В начале каждого хода ОД персонажа восстанавливаются до максимального значения.

Para lanzar ataques y usar {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} en combate, un personaje necesita gastar {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}puntos de acción{/g} (PA). El total se muestra en el panel en la parte inferior de la pantalla.
Cada ataque o capacidad tiene un coste en PA asociado. El número de cuadrados que hay junto a los iconos de acciones de ataque y otras capacidades indica su coste en PA.
Al principio de cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} de un personaje, sus PA vuelven a su valor máximo.
languages.original_text:
To make attacks and use {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} in combat, a character must spend {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} (or AP). Their total is displayed on the panel at the bottom of the screen.
Every attack or ability has a certain AP cost associated with it. The number of squares next to the icons of attack actions and other abilities indicates their AP cost.
At the start of each character's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, their AP are restored to their maximum value.

traits.locale_text:
Para lanzar ataques y usar {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} en combate, un personaje necesita gastar {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}puntos de acción{/g} (PA). El total se muestra en el panel en la parte inferior de la pantalla.
Cada ataque o capacidad tiene un coste en PA asociado. El número de cuadrados que hay junto a los iconos de acciones de ataque y otras capacidades indica su coste en PA.
Al principio de cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} de un personaje, sus PA vuelven a su valor máximo.

languages.text:
戦闘中に攻撃を仕掛けたり{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を使用するために、キャラクターは{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}アクションポイント{/g}（AP）を消費しなければならない。画面下のパネルに合計値が表示される。
すべての攻撃やアビリティには、それぞれ一定のAPコストがある。攻撃アクションやその他のアビリティのアイコンの横の数字は、APコストを示している。
各キャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時に、そのキャラクターのAPは最大値まで回復する。
languages.original_text:
To make attacks and use {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} in combat, a character must spend {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} (or AP). Their total is displayed on the panel at the bottom of the screen.
Every attack or ability has a certain AP cost associated with it. The number of squares next to the icons of attack actions and other abilities indicates their AP cost.
At the start of each character's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, their AP are restored to their maximum value.

traits.locale_text:
戦闘中に攻撃を仕掛けたり{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を使用するために、キャラクターは{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}アクションポイント{/g}（または AP）を消費しなければならない。画面下のパネルに合計が表示される。
すべての攻撃やアビリティには、それぞれ一定の AP コストがある。攻撃アクションやその他のアビリティのアイコンの横の数字は、AP コストを示している。
各キャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時に、そのキャラクターのAP は最大値まで回復する。

languages.text:
角色需要消耗{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}，才能在战斗中发动攻击或使用{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}。行动点数会显示在屏幕下方的面板上。
每种攻击与能力都会消耗一定量行动点数。攻击与其他能力图标旁边的方格数，代表耗费的行动点数。
每个角色的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，该角色的行动点数会恢复至最大值。
languages.original_text:
To make attacks and use {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} in combat, a character must spend {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} (or AP). Their total is displayed on the panel at the bottom of the screen.
Every attack or ability has a certain AP cost associated with it. The number of squares next to the icons of attack actions and other abilities indicates their AP cost.
At the start of each character's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, their AP are restored to their maximum value.

traits.locale_text:
角色需要消耗{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}，才能在战斗中发动攻击或使用{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}。行动点数会显示在屏幕下方的面板上。
每种攻击与能力都会消耗一定量行动点数。攻击与其他能力图标旁边的方格数，代表耗费的行动点数。
每个角色的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，该角色的行动点数会恢复至最大值。

languages.text:
Um Angriffe auszuführen und {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} im Kampf einzusetzen, muss ein Charakter {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}Aktionspunkte{/g} (oder AP) ausgeben. Die Gesamtzahl wird am unteren Rand des Bildschirms angezeigt.
Jeder Angriff oder jede Fähigkeit hat einen bestimmten AP-Wert. Die Anzahl der Kästchen neben den Symbolen von Angriffen und anderen Fähigkeiten zeigt ihre AP-Kosten an.
Zu Beginn des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} jedes Charakters werden die AP auf ihren Maximalwert zurückgesetzt.
languages.original_text:
To make attacks and use {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} in combat, a character must spend {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} (or AP). Their total is displayed on the panel at the bottom of the screen.
Every attack or ability has a certain AP cost associated with it. The number of squares next to the icons of attack actions and other abilities indicates their AP cost.
At the start of each character's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, their AP are restored to their maximum value.

traits.locale_text:
Um Angriffe auszuführen und {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} im Kampf einzusetzen, muss ein Charakter {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}Aktionspunkte{/g} (oder AP) ausgeben. Die Gesamtzahl wird auf dem Panel am unteren Rand des Bildschirms angezeigt.
Jeder Angriff oder jede Fähigkeit hat einen bestimmten AP-Wert. Die Anzahl der Kästchen neben den Symbolen von Angriffen und anderen Fähigkeiten zeigt ihre AP-Kosten an.
Zu Beginn der {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} jedes Charakters werden die AP auf ihren Maximalwert zurückgesetzt.

languages.text:
Pour effectuer des attaques et utiliser des {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} en situation de combat, un personnage doit utiliser des {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}points d'action{/g} (ou PA) dont le total s'affiche sur le panneau en bas de l'écran.
Chaque attaque ou capacité est associée à un coût en PA. Le nombre de carrés à côté des icônes des actions d'attaque et autres capacités indique leur coût en PA.
Au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de chaque personnage, ses PA sont rétablis à leur valeur maximale.
languages.original_text:
To make attacks and use {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} in combat, a character must spend {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} (or AP). Their total is displayed on the panel at the bottom of the screen.
Every attack or ability has a certain AP cost associated with it. The number of squares next to the icons of attack actions and other abilities indicates their AP cost.
At the start of each character's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, their AP are restored to their maximum value.

traits.locale_text:
Pour effectuer des attaques et utiliser des {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} en situation de combat, un personnage doit utiliser des {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}points d’action{/g} (ou PA) dont le total est affiché sur le panneau en bas de l'écran.
Chaque attaque ou capacité est associée à un coût en PA. Le nombre de carrés situés à côté des icônes des actions d'attaque et autres capacités indique leur coût en PA.
Au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de chaque personnage, ses PA sont rétablis à leur valeur maximale.

languages.text:
Bir karakter, çatışmada saldırı yapmak veya {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g} kullanmak için {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}eylem puanı{/g} (veya EP) harcamalıdır. Toplam eylem puanı, ekranın altındaki panelde görüntülenir.
Her saldırı veya kabiliyetin belirli bir EP bedeli bulunur. Saldırı eylemleri ile diğer kabiliyetlerin simgelerinin yanı başındaki kare sayısı, onların EP bedelini gösterir.
Karakterin her {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} başında, EP'si yeniden maksimum değerine çıkar.
languages.original_text:
To make attacks and use {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} in combat, a character must spend {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} (or AP). Their total is displayed on the panel at the bottom of the screen.
Every attack or ability has a certain AP cost associated with it. The number of squares next to the icons of attack actions and other abilities indicates their AP cost.
At the start of each character's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, their AP are restored to their maximum value.
